    Google Assistant & Particle Wake-On-LAN

    Apr 13, 2017

    I was trying out the new Raspberry Pi Particle Beta and put together a quick project with IFTTT and Google Assistant to turn on computers with voice commands. It was based on a similar Hackster.io project that used the Spark Core / Photon and a companion Android app to send WOL packets. The original article is here and my replication of the project is noted in “Replications” at the bottom of the page.
